title: jpog54
author: jpog54
content: Hey everyone!I'm looking for a 500usd loan. I did read the sticky, willing to take the risk asking for a non collateral loan.The loan would be repaid in a month, maybe slightly less if needed.I can verify my identity and accept cashapp or zelle if needed. Open to any offers

comments.author: ps34
comments.body: welcome to my world  no chance in hell it seems

comments.author: jpog54
comments.body: Quote from: ps34 on March 09, 2023, 11:07:11 PMwelcome to my world  no chance in hell it seems  I'm not desperate for it, but it will definitely give me some breathing room until my next payment is sent

comments.author: bitbollo
comments.body: if you have not a collateral, it's really hard maybe impossible you cant get a loan here .moreover you have not reputation or previous trade , and in a couple of minutes you can just create a newbie account.what if you cannot repay this loan or you just disappear ?   well, if you are reasonable enough I think you have clearly understood where is the issue...

comments.author: Timelord2067
comments.body: Quote from: jpog54 on March 09, 2023, 10:42:29 PMwilling to take the risk asking for a non collateral loan.The risk is not yours to take - but you know that already.QuoteOpen to any offers Does "chainsaw-enema" ring any bells?

comments.author: jpog54
comments.body: Quote from: bitbollo on March 09, 2023, 11:27:39 PMif you have not a collateral, it's really hard maybe impossible you cant get a loan here .moreover you have not reputation or previous trade , and in a couple of minutes you can just create a newbie account.what if you cannot repay this loan or you just disappear ?   well, if you are reasonable enough I think you have clearly understood where is the issue...I could skype and ID verify myself. I understand it's nothing compared to collateral, but given I don't have collateral it's the best I can offer

comments.author: bitbollo
comments.body: Quote from: jpog54 on March 10, 2023, 12:12:19 AMQuote from: bitbollo on March 09, 2023, 11:27:39 PMif you have not a collateral, it's really hard maybe impossible you cant get a loan here .moreover you have not reputation or previous trade , and in a couple of minutes you can just create a newbie account.what if you cannot repay this loan or you just disappear ?   well, if you are reasonable enough I think you have clearly understood where is the issue...I could skype and ID verify myself. I understand it's nothing compared to collateral, but given I don't have collateral it's the best I can offerafter I have your skype and ID ... what change? ok let's figure out you are really honest ... but you cannot pay for some real world issue... what I can do with your skype account? of course nothing. that why I suggest (strongly) to lock this topic or just stop begging for a loan since you can be tagged as a potential / scammer.but what matters? just create a new account and a newbie is here again

comments.author: jpog54
comments.body: Locking this topic.  Edit: if I knew how to. In any case, don’t need the loan anymore

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: jpog54 on March 10, 2023, 06:46:39 PMLocking this topic.  Edit: if I knew how to. In any case, don’t need the loan anymore it's easy, and it would be good for the prevention of potential spam.at the bottom of the page, on the left side, you have a "lock topic" option.

comments.author: jpog54
comments.body: Quote from: examplens on March 11, 2023, 11:26:20 AMQuote from: jpog54 on March 10, 2023, 06:46:39 PMLocking this topic.  Edit: if I knew how to. In any case, don’t need the loan anymore it's easy, and it would be good for the prevention of potential spam.at the bottom of the page, on the left side, you have a "lock topic" option.https://i.ibb.co/6009g9X/image.pngI see it nowThanks!
